text.tspan: Actions, both can be used by Game objects
One collection: Position; if someone will handle the
action, it will set its ID to let know who handled the action
GNode can update collection of actions
Key can be mapped directly to the Action
Touch must be handled before it will be mapped
Key doesn't need to be mapped to Action (but can be)
Idea: move action to behavior and let environment to control only keys and touches; oillaaa
-- First object will get this ACTION and handle it
-- Object will have set its HIT attribtue
-- Object will have set its HIT attribute
1 poss: set action and traverse to children (Wait for first)
2 poss: set event and event listener
3 poss: send message that action has been created
